import torch
import torch.optim as optim
import torch.nn as nn
import numpy 
import math
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

torch.manual_seed(42)
p = torch.tensor([10,6,2],dtype=torch.float)
p1=torch.diag(p)
n=3
tao=100
dt = 1e-3
T=int(10/dt)
B=10
w=torch.randn(n,n, device='cpu', requires_grad=True,dtype=torch.float)
w1=torch.diag(w)
w_rec=torch.diag(w1)
w1_rec = w-w_rec
lr = 1e-3
n_epochs = 8
optimizer = optim.Adam([w], lr=lr)
V=torch.zeros(T,n)


color=['b','c','k','g','w','m','r','y']
for epoch in range(n_epochs):
    z=torch.randn(1,n)
    Z=torch.zeros(T,n)
    for t in range(T):
        N=torch.randn(1,n)
        z_dot=(-z+(z@w1_rec)/math.sqrt(n))
        z = z + z_dot*dt+N*math.sqrt(dt)
        Z[t] = z
    

    loss = ((Z@p1)**2).mean()
    loss.backward()       
    optimizer.step()
    optimizer.zero_grad()
    V=torch.zeros(n,1)

    for i in range(n):
        V[i]=torch.var(Z[:,i])
    print (V)
    
    plt.scatter(p,V.detach().numpy(),color=color[epoch])
    
    
plt.show()  


plt.plot(Z[:,0].detach().numpy(), Z[:,1].detach().numpy())
plt.show()  


    
    
#plt.plot(p,V.detach().numpy(), 'r--', p, V2.detach().numpy(), 'bs', p, V.detach().numpy(), 'g^')
#plt.show()

B=10

w1=torch.diag(w)
w_rec=torch.diag(w1)
z=torch.randn(1,n)

Z=torch.zeros(T,n)


for t in range(T):
    N=torch.randn(1,n)
    z_dot=(-z+z@w_rec)/tao+N*math.sqrt(dt)
    z = z + z_dot*dt
    #print (z)
    Z[t] = z
    
   
    
    



#print (Z[:,0].detach().numpy(), Z[:,1].detach().numpy())

plt.show()

import torch
import torch.optim as optim
import torch.nn as nn
import numpy 
import math
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd





torch.manual_seed(42)

n=3
tao=100
T=1000
dt = 0.01
B=10
w=torch.randn(n,n, device='cpu', requires_grad=True)
w1=torch.diag(w)
w_rec=torch.diag(w1)
w1_rec = w-w_rec



lr = 1e-3
n_epochs = 1000



optimizer = optim.Adam([w], lr=lr)
Z=torch.zeros(n_epochs,n)

for epoch in range(n_epochs):
    z=torch.randn(1,n)
    


    for t in range(T):
        N=torch.randn(1,n)
        z_dot=(-z+z@w1_rec)/tao+N*math.sqrt(dt)
        z = z + z_dot*dt
        
      
    loss = (z**2.mean()

    loss.backward()       
    optimizer.step()
    optimizer.zero_grad()
    Z[epoch] = z
    

print (Z)
print (w1_rec)
plt.plot(Z[:,0].detach().numpy(), Z[:,1].detach().numpy())

plt.show()
